putting data into narrow form:
```{r}
newNCI60 <- NCI60 %>%
  gather(key=cellLine, value=expression, -Probe)
```

```{r}
newNCI60 %>%
  group_by(Probe, cellLine) %>%
  summarise(expression=mean(expression))%>%
  ungroup()
```
calculating SD
```{r}
standevNCI60 <-newNCI60%>%
  group_by(Probe)%>%
  summarise(spread=sd(expression))
```

```{r}
selectedspread<-standevNCI60%>%
  filter(spread>4.25)
```

wrangling into wide form
```{r}
wideNCI60 <- selectedspread%>%
  spread(key=Probe, spread)
```
